com.microsoft.azure.storage

Class StorageKey

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.azure.storage.StorageKey

  • public final class StorageKey
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a container for a storage key.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StorageKey(byte[] key)
      Creates an instance of the StorageKey class.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Computes a signature for the specified string using the HMAC-SHA256 algorithm.

      Computes a signature for the specified string using the HMAC-SHA512 algorithm.

      Returns the Base64-encoded key.

    • Constructor Detail

      • StorageKey

        public StorageKey(byte[] key)
        Creates an instance of the StorageKey class.
        Parameters:
        key - An array of bytes that represent the storage key.

    • Method Detail

      • computeMacSha256

        public static java.lang.String computeMacSha256(StorageKey storageKey,
                                                java.lang.String stringToSign)
                                         throws java.security.InvalidKeyException
        Computes a signature for the specified string using the HMAC-SHA256 algorithm.
        Parameters:
        storageKey - A StorageKey object that represents the storage key to use.
        stringToSign - The UTF-8-encoded string to sign.
        Returns:
        A String that contains the HMAC-SHA256-encoded signature.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the string to sign is not a valid Base64-encoded string.
        java.security.InvalidKeyException - If the key is not a valid storage key.

      • computeMacSha512

        public static java.lang.String computeMacSha512(StorageKey storageKey,
                                                java.lang.String stringToSign)
                                         throws java.security.InvalidKeyException
        Computes a signature for the specified string using the HMAC-SHA512 algorithm.
        Parameters:
        storageKey - A StorageKey object that represents the storage key to use.
        stringToSign - The UTF-8-encoded string to sign.
        Returns:
        A String that contains the HMAC-SHA512-encoded signature.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the string to sign is not a valid Base64-encoded string.
        java.security.InvalidKeyException - If the key is not a valid storage key.

      • getBase64EncodedKey

        public java.lang.String getBase64EncodedKey()
        Returns the Base64-encoded key.
        Returns:
        A String that represents the Base64-encoded key.

      • getKey

        public byte[] getKey()
        Returns the key.
        Returns:
        A byte array that represents the key.

      • setKey

        public void setKey(byte[] key)
        Sets the key to be used, using the specified byte array as the key.

        This method is provided to support key rotation. This method is not thread-safe.

        Parameters:
        key - A byte array that represents the key being assigned.

      • setKey

        public void setKey(java.lang.String key)
        Sets the key to be used, using the specified String as the key.

        This method is provided to support key rotation. This method is not thread-safe.

        Parameters:
        key - A String that represents the key being assigned.
